name: Pets Keeper
description:
I am not really experienced in game development but i tried to make this game with whatever I learned in school. As far as I know, it is playable and has no major bugs. Sorry for the way it looks or rather that it doesn't look like anything. 

The point is that you need to make money by breeding and selling rats.
If you have no money it is game over.

All rats have color genes and while breeding two together it is more likely that a rare color parent will give a rare color child.

I have no plans to continue developing this as I am rather inexperienced and honestly I'd rather remake this entirely in unity or something with actual graphics.
